mapper.select: SELECT * FROM injoy.project P inner join injoy."projectMember" m on p."projectId" = m."projectId" left join injoy."bookMark" b on p."projectId" = b."projectId" where m."userId" =#{id} and "authority" != 'REQUEST'
SELECT "projectId" FROM injoy.project order by "projectId" DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT * FROM injoy."project" p left join (SELECT "projectId" FROM injoy."projectMember" where "userId"= #{userId}) m on p."projectId" = m."projectId" where m."projectId" IS NULL and "projectName" LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT * FROM injoy."project" p left join (SELECT "projectId" FROM injoy."projectMember" where "userId"= #{userId}) m on p."projectId" = m."projectId" where m."projectId" IS NULL and "invitationCode"= #{keyword}
SELECT * FROM injoy."projectMember" m inner join injoy."project" p on m."projectId" = p."projectId" where "userId" = #{userId} and "authority"= 'REQUEST'
